text: Jos√© Miguel "Mike" Tuason Arroyo (born June 27, 1945) is a former First Gentleman of the Philippines. He is the husband of Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, the current Representative of the Second District of Pampanga. He is the only male Spouse of a President of the Philippines and Vice President of the Philippines. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino lawyers Category:First Ladies and First Gentlemen of the Philippines Category:People from Negros Occidental Category:People from Pampanga
title: Jose Miguel Arroyo
